_sText:
hii

A friend want me make moving texture so this is smal prefabs scrolling texture. Ihave made only 2 texture right now, if you have time make more then put here in gamebanana to download.

1* You need download VTF-editor. Make a copy of texture.vtf you like and text.vmf and rename it. Open vmt.text with vtf-editor and change the name like your texture and angel if you want, and save it. and you will have scrolling texture. 

2* This is the best tutorial on making Transparent, Animated, Scrolling, and Detail textures.
[tutorial ...](http://www.tophattwaffle.com/?page_id=397 "tutorial Transparent")

3* And to download hl2 and css texture you like here is the link http://server.liveinfear.co.uk/fastdl/forp/materials/concrete/

4* How to make texture with Free program Gimp 2,6
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=svRKbxUdxQg

And this is link to my map i have made with scrolling texture.   http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/152885

Have fun =)
